document_data.name: Emthrara Undril
document_data.mainbody: '''Emthrara Undril''' was a female [[human]] [[Harper]] who worked as a dancer at [[The Laughing Lass]] tavern in [[Suzail]] to maintain her cover.
document_data.Appearance: Emthrara was beautiful with long blonde hair.
document_data.Background: Emthrara once defeated and took apart a [[clockwork horror]], so she was called by [[Laspeera Inthré]] to help analyze the remains of the [[abraxus]] during the [[abraxus affair]] in [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Emthrara wore a silver locket around her neck that contained a tiny silver harp, the sign of a Harper.
document_data.Personality: Emthrara was proud of the fact that she had met [[Elminster]] and he paid her a compliment about her dancing.
